news_header: Donald Trump expressed gratitude to Finland for its support in Afghanistan, while also receiving odd comments about the country. Their relationship peaked during the 2018 summit in Helsinki with Putin.
news_text: Donald Trump thanked Finland for its assistance in Afghanistan, acknowledging its support for the US-led coalition. Their relationship peaked in 2018 during the Helsinki summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin. Trump has made various comments about Finland over the years, including questioning its independence and discussing forest management practices. Notably, he once mentioned Finland's effective handling of wildfires as a model during a visit to California.
